txt.en: You should burn the tents of the Orcs at Maustazg
While patrolling the Entwash Vale, an opportunity to sow mayhem at the enemy camp of Maustazg presents itself.
While patrolling the Entwash Vale, an opportunity to sow mayhem at the enemy camp of Maustazg presents itself.\n\nYou should burn tents within Maustazg.
Tents of the enemy can be found at the Orc-camp of Maustazg, east of Eaworth.\n\nYou should sow mayhem at Maustazg by setting fire to the Orcs' tents.
'Your raid was brilliant! When we attack, the Orcs will be in a terrible disarray.'
Tents of the enemy can be found at the Orc-camp of Maustazg, east of Eaworth.\n\nYou should sow mayhem at Maustazg by setting fire to the Orcs' tents.
Ingmar is in the Mead Hall of Eaworth, west of Maustazg.\n\nYou should return to Ingmar and let him know what you have done.
Talk to Ingmar in the Mead Hall of Eaworth
